response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "low", "Young age is a risk factor, but 20 years old is not extremely young."),
    ("gender", "medium", "Male gender is associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("race", "low", "White race generally has lower recidivism rates."),
    ("prior arrests", "medium", "One prior arrest indicates some criminal history but not extensive."),
    ("convictions", "low", "No convictions suggest less serious offenses or effective legal representation."),
    ("height and weight", "medium", "Average height and weight do not significantly impact recidivism risk."),
    ("marital status", "high", "Never being married is associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("living alone", "low", "Not living alone can be protective against recidivism."),
    ("education", "medium", "GED certificate indicates some education but not completion of high school or higher."),
    ("employment", "high", "Holding four jobs in a year suggests instability and potential economic stressors."),
    ("drug use", "high", "Past use of marijuana and cocaine significantly increases recidivism risk."),
    ("depression", "low", "No recent feelings of depression are protective against recidivism."),
    ("family structure", "medium", "Living with biological mother in a household of six in an urban area indicates some family support but also potential stressors."),
    ("religious beliefs", "high", "Lack of religious or spiritual beliefs can be associated with higher recidivism rates.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 65
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 204 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 4 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
